explains: n. 发明物；发明，创造；虚构，编造；发明才能，创造力；创意曲（短乐曲的题目）
wordGroup: patent of invention 发明专利

sentences.en: The spinning wheel was a Chinese invention.
sentences.cn: 纺车是中国人的一项发明。

sentences.en: You can't fault them for lack of invention.
sentences.cn: 你不能因为他们没有发明而加以批评他们。

sentences.en: His invention was not commercially successful.
sentences.cn: 他的发明从赢利角度看并不成功。
